dmca.title: First Notice, Second Offense
dmca.body:
nc 

-----Original Message-----
From: Legal Department [mailto:legal@enautics.com] 
Sent: Wednesday, April 13, 2005 5:30 PM
To: legal@theplanet.com; sales@hostgator.com; support@lanssoft.com
Subject: First Notice, Second Offense


>> ATTENTION LANSSOFT.COM:

It has come to our attention that you company has stolen our web site html,
flash and graphics from our site toolbarsoftware.com 

Your site: lanssoft.com  is in violation of US and International copyright
laws.

As you realize you previously hosted at WebsiteSource.com

        S. Rosendahl: info@websitesource.com
        Web Site Source, Inc.
        2476 Bolsover, Suite 484
        Houston, Texas 77005
        US
        Phone- 512-608-9990 
        Fax- 800-863-6499

Web Site Source turned off your account and now you decided to keep breaking
the law and have moved the stolen copy of our site to HostGator.com

You have 24 hours to remove our content from your domain. If you don't
respond with appropriate action you will be held liable for hosting this
content. 


>> ATTENTION HOSTING PROVIDER LEGAL DEPARTMENT: Your client,
Lanssoft.com has violated US and International copyright laws. 
Under the provisions given by this law you are officially
been given served notice by this electronic communication.

If you don't respond with appropriate action you will
be held liable for hosting this content.

This client doesn't care they have stolen are content because
they believe because they are in China they can do what they
want.

>> ATTENTION UPSTREAM PROVIDER LEGAL DEPARTMENT: Your client, 
Web Site Source, Inc. has is hosting material stolen from our web site,
ToolbarSoftware.com Under the provisions given by this law 
you are officially been given served notice by this 
electronic communication.

If you don't respond with appropriate action you will
be held liable for hosting this content and our legal
department WILL be contacting you with 72 Hours.

            ThePlanet.com Internet Services, Inc.
            TPCM
        1333 North Stemmons Freeway
        Suite 110
        Dallas, TX 75207

DO NOT IGNORE THIS NOTICE.

Sincerely,

Dion Jones
eNautics, Inc.
559 E. Technology, Ave
Building C
Orem, Utah 84097

Bcc: 
Smart, Schofield, Shorter & Lunceford
5295 South Commerce Drive, Suite 200
Murray, Utah 84107
